transcript:

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello sir, aap Rohit ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan haan, boliye boliye.
Executive: Ji sir, subah aapne call kiya tha sir, actually us time mein meeting mein thi, is wajah se main aap se baat nahi kar payi. To
Customer: Haan, koi baat nahi.
Executive: Ji bataiye sir, aapne phir waha pe customer care number pe call kiya hoga, right sir, 969.
Customer: Haan haan haan, uske liye thoda sa, actually main na products add karne ke liye us din hum log baat kiye the na, wo wala mere paas photo ready hai. Photos ready hai, main photo bhej raha hu. Wo, wo uska aapka whatsapp ka number bhi bhejna hai kya? Aap bola tha.
Executive: Haan sir, aap mujhe whatsapp ke number pe bhejiye, but uske liye na sir mujhe ek to aapke samne hi karna hoga, to wo mujhe video meet pe bula ke aapko aur uske samne hi aapko phir mujhe ek ek edit karna hoga, taki aap thik bolo to phir main usko aage continue kar paun. Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai, 2:00 baje ko, 2:00 baje connect kar sakte hain hum log? Phir se, usse pehle main photo bhej raha hu 2:00 baje ko.
Executive: Ah sir, 2:00 baje nahi ho payega, 3:00 baje ke baad, 3:00 baje ke baad connect kar lu?
Customer: Ah 3:00 baje ko mere ko ek meeting hai, shayad wo meeting hone ke baad 3:30, 3:30 ya 4:00 baje ko paas.
Executive: Thik hai, okay fine, no issues, main 3:45 pe kar leti hu sir.
Customer: Haan thik hai, koi baat nahi, chalo thik hai.
Executive: 3:45. Aaiye kaam kar lo, mere ko whatsapp mein, aai bhej dijiye, aai uska main photo bhej raha hu.
Executive: Okay, to sir, aap basically sir, ek second rukiye aap call pe rahiye, actually aapne jo customer care number pe call kiya tha na, to wo ticket create ho gaya hai, to wo mujhe close bhi karna hoga. To aap mujhe pehle, haan just like aap, tab wo ticket raise ho jata hai na, phir aap customer care number pe call karte ho, to ticket raise ho jata hai, no issues. To wo main close kar sakti hu na sir aapko, kyunki ab aapka.
Customer: Haan haan, close kar dijiye, close kar dijiye.
Executive: Haan, wo kar dungi, baki jab aapke paas uska review ke liye aayega ki aap satisfied ho ya nahi satisfied ho ticket ke regarding, to aap satisfied.
Customer: Nahi, aur ek cheez hai, wo bahut sara call hai, wo call mein kya aate hain na, hum log un logo ko khud se call karte hain, wo interest nahi hai. Matlab they are not showing interest.
Executive: Achha. Okay. Showing yani interest, jo buyers, aapke query calls aa rahe hain, right?
Customer: No no no no, buyers ka.
Executive: Haan, I am khud se call kar raha hu, whatsapp also, I am sending whatsapp also, but wo na two customers only responding.
Executive: I completely understand sir, actually sir these these buyers are just searching for the inquiry only, right? Sometimes they will become interested when when you have the healthy conversation between you and buyer, right? So don't worry.
Customer: Even though even easy, yeah. Even though I am responding, they are not responding back.
Executive: Okay. They simply closing the call and also whatsapp also they are not giving response.
Executive: Okay, they are not giving response on a I am taking them into the whatsapp number also, so from IndiaMART to again take into the whatsapp number, I am giving all the clear picture in the whatsapp also they are not responding to me.
Customer: Sir yeah.
Executive: But also even when I am calling back them, they are not responding.
Executive: I completely understand sir, but they didn't give any response on the calls and inquiry or the lead manager sir?
Customer: No no no.
Executive: Lead managers also, call also.
Executive: Okay. No worries. There is no response, one or two only you can see in my lead manager response, but there is no response in the lead manager list. Even I am calling them the mobile and also whatsapp also I am taking no response.
Executive: Yeah, I completely understand sir, but don't worry sir, actually I just want to ask you that what type of response matlab did you get any business from the IndiaMART within these five months once?
Customer: Ah no, no no no business from the India.
Executive: Not a single conversion?
Customer: No. They one one person came but then after he also waved off. He said that okay I will get in touch with you requirement has been closed.
Executive: So seriously you don't get any deal from the buyers?
Customer: No. No, that's why I told right, deals will be conversation, entire conversation will be going on, but after that they are not giving the business to me.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Overall I got it only for the only for the three liters of requirement, that's it. After total five months.
Executive: Yeah, okay for that I also update your catalog. So let's create let us talk on a video call after 3:30, okay sir so that I can update your catalog so that it will it can increase your visibility and it can also help to get the relevant buyleads sir, right?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Yeah, because through catalog your profile has a positive impact towards the buyer, okay sir.
Customer: That's why I am relating here many of the customers interacting me business buyleads and all but they are not purchasing.
Executive: Yeah. Okay no worries sir then I will connect after 3:30. Yeah okay. Alright. Thanks.
Customer: Yeah, okay fine. And I will give you a text on a whatsapp please send the photos on.
Customer: Sure sure sure sure. You just ping me, okay? Yeah, I am getting one more call. Yeah, thank you.
Executive: Thank you so much sir.
Customer: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add products to his catalog.

- Not getting relevant buyleads.

- Buyers are not responding.

- No business from IndiaMART in five months.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to update the catalog.

- Executive will connect on video call at 3:45 PM.

- Executive will close the customer care ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on video call at 3:45 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, whatsapp, video call
